**歌詞

5, 4... new sound yeah!!
3, 2... old sound yeah!!

recently, good things are not happening.
listen to music.

let's walk with my ipod.

no! no! no! yeah.

i play guitar.

think simply.
take it easy.
with live music.

think simply.
